âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Real-time frequency visualization of audio input â€¢ Send messages by converting text to sound â€¢ Receive messages by listening to sound and decoding it back to text â€¢ Distinctive start and end signatures to mark transmissions
ðŸ“– Summary: This application enables real-time data transmission via sound. It encodes text into audio frequencies, transmits them, and decodes the received frequencies back into text, using start and end signatures for message demarcation. A real-time frequency visualization aids in monitoring the process.
